alert.note: Alert for Butler; Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 10:10AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Logan and southwestern Butler Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 910 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weir, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Logan and southwestern Butler Counties, including the following locations... Insco, Huntsville, Gordonsville, Dimple, Spa, Epleys, Dennis, Wolf Lick, Crossroad and Buffalo Fork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for south central Kentucky.
